attributes.title: AI App Generator
attributes.description: Design your own app UI by describing what you want to build
attributes.prompt: Create a sprint-planning tool that lets users define backlogs, estimate stories, assign owners, and track burndown.

suggestions.title: Link in Bio
suggestions.description: Create a simple link-in-bio page with social media links and a bio section

suggestions.title: About Me
suggestions.description: Build a personal portfolio page with your background, skills, and contact information

suggestions.title: Recipe Database
suggestions.description: Create a recipe management app with search, categories, and cooking instructions

suggestions.title: To Do List
suggestions.description: Build a task management app with lists, priorities, and completion tracking

suggestions.title: Creative Portfolio
suggestions.description: Design a showcase for creative work with galleries, project details, and contact forms

suggestions.title: Event Calendar
suggestions.description: Build an event management app with calendar views, RSVP tracking, and event details

suggestions.title: Fitness Tracker
suggestions.description: Create a workout tracking app with exercise logs, progress charts, and goal setting

suggestions.title: Budget Manager
suggestions.description: Design a personal finance app with expense tracking, budget categories, and spending insights
